items.summary: Fix the PortfolioGallery component to correctly reference portfolio images from the frontend/public/assets/generated directory, ensuring all 120 images (30 per category: Home, Commercial, Office, Hotels) display properly without broken image icons

Verify that the portfolio image filenames in the component match the exact generated filenames in frontend/public/assets/generated, using proper public asset paths (e.g., /assets/generated/filename.png) instead of relative imports
